{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/espressobin/ |sp = http://espressobin.net/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GlobalScale |model = ESPRESSObin |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v7 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YCJ-ESPRESSOBIN |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F3720; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25U3235FM2I-100; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K512M16HA-107; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6341; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:AD:4E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.03;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.52;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, SATA 3.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, console,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, GPIO |addchip = USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific;PL2303SA;;1;,,, Dual BiDirectional I2C/SMBus V-Level Translator;NXP;PCA9306;;1;,,, 3A 1.5MHz Synchro Step-Down Regulator;Feeling Technology;FP6165;;6;,,, 4-bit Dual Supply Translating Transceiver;Nexperia;74AVC4T245;;1;,,, 6A 23V 500kHz Synchronous Buck Converter;Richtek;RT6220;;1;,,, 2A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;uPI Semi;uP8809P;;1;,,, 12V Dual P-Channel MOSFET;Vishay;Si6913DQ;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Armbian,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/18/2020 |estreldate = 12/2018 |estprice = 69 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07KTMBCS1 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ESPRESSObin_V7_0-2" is silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|GlobalScale Devices|GlobalScale}}
==Hardware specification== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F3720 @1.2GHz :Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Storage: MicroSD (TF) Card slot, :SATA 3.0, eMMC (optional) *Network: 3x 10/100/1000 (1Gb) Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 ports *GPIO: 2x 46-pin headers *Power Source: 12V/2A via DC power
==See also== ===Models=== :;SD-WAN/CPE *[[GlobalScale MOCHAbin]] • [[Marvell]] Quad Core SoC • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/mochabin-copy/ PPage] *[[GlobalScale ESPRESSObin Ultra]] • [[Marvell]] Dual Core SoC • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/espressobin-ultra/ PPage] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/globalscale/globalscale_espressobin-ultra ToH] :FCC ID: YCJULTRA (2020-03-26) ''Globalscale Technologies Inc.''
:;Edge Gateways, Firewall and SBC *[[GlobalScale ESPRESSObin v5]] • [[Marvell]] Dual Core SoC • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/espressobin/ PPage] *[[GlobalScale ESPRESSObin v7]] • [[Marvell]] Dual Core SoC • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/espressobin/ PPage] :FCC ID: YCJ-ESPRESSOBIN (2020-11-18) ''Globalscale Technologies Inc.'' *[[GlobalScale Sheeva64]] • [[GlobalScale Sheeva64 WiFi]] • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/sheeva-64/ PPage] *[[SolidRun MACCHIATObin DoubleShot]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/marvell/marvell_macchiatobin OpenWrt wiki]
